item.title: A message from Mr Vonesch:
item.description: For grade 10 and 11 students, if you would like to go on a service trip to Costa Rica next year, the deadline to submit your application is TOMORROW, February 3rd.

item.title: A message from Mrs Marcellus:
item.description: Grad photo orders have started to arrive. If you ordered grad photos, please check in Guidance with Mrs Marcellus to pick them up. Thanks!

item.title: A message from Ms.Timmins:
item.description: Reminder to Varsity Girls' hockey players to check Teams for important information regarding hockey this week.

item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: All online students need to report to the atrium at the beginning of their online period today to meet briefly with Ms. Timmins and Mrs. Marcellus.

item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office.

item.title: A message from: Mrs. Longval :
item.description: Attention Ravens! Interested in joining the Varsity CrossFit Team? Sign-up sheets are posted outside the gymnasium. There will be an info meeting on Tuesday, February 10 at 10:45 a.m. in the weight room. Training sessions run Tuesdays from 2:20–3:00 p.m. and our CrossFit competition is scheduled for April 2026. Come check it out!

item.title: A message from Mrs. Longval:
item.description: the Weight Room is open daily at lunch from 10:40–11:20. Thursdays are reserved for female students only. Plus, the weight room is also open Tuesday after school. Come Join Mrs. Longval for a strength, cardio or stretch session.
